bloodthirstyflowers.page.haemoflor0: The $(item)Haemoflor$(0) is a $(item)Life$(0)-flavoured counterpart to the $(l:generating_flowers/hydroangeas)$(item)Hydroangeas$(0)$(/l). The flower absorbs $(item)Life$(0) around it (at the same altitude) to generate $(thing)Mana$(0).$(p)After absorbing one block of $(item)Life$(0), the flower will produce $(thing)Mana$(0) continually for around 45 seconds, but afterwards needs a bit of time (around 5 minutes) to cool down before it can absorb more.
bloodthirstyflowers.page.haemoflor2: The $(thing)Mana$(0) throughput the $(item)Haemoflor$(0) produces during its active phase is extremely high; it's an ideal flower for a quick boost in stores.$(p)However, during its "cooldown" period, any adjacent $(thing)Life$(0) will be absorbed and reset the cooldown without yielding any $(thing)Mana$(0).
bloodthirstyflowers.page.haemoflor3: While placing $(item)Life$(0) in the world is definitely possible via $(item)Dispensers$(0), automatically gathering it and carrying it from the $(thing)Blood Altar$(0) is not.$(p)As such, the $(item)Haemoflor$(0) is classified as a "semi-automatable" flower.
